pages.text: Quaggas wander the plains of the Overworld. If TFC is installed, you can find Quaggas alongside Horses. $(br2)Quaggas can be tamed much like horses and can have saddles and chests, but will run away from players when approached in the wild.
Quaggas cannot wear armor. They can have the same markings as horses, but cannot spawn with them naturally (must be bred in). $(br2)Quaggas enjoy the same foods as horses.
